title: Screen messed up
body: So I hopped on league the other day no problem until I finally got into a game and on summonses rift my screen was shifted up and to the left. I tried different resolutions and nothing fixed it. I tried taking a screenshot but the screenshot didn't show the blacked out part. I've looked around but couldn't find anything that worked. Tried maximizing it too.

replies.body:
This sounds like a strange issue with your game screen.  I'm curious if you're on a 4K or have your resolution set to exceed 1920x1080.  In both cases, you can run into problems like this especially if you often tab in and out.  If this is the case, see if you can try reducing your resolution.  If you have any issues doing that, a config reset can help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.



Let me know if the issue persists!
